name: FMT Consultants, LLC
description:
FMT Consultants, LLC is a leading provider of integrated business solutions and information technology services throughout the US and Canada with a significant presence in San Diego County, Orange County and Los Angeles County.
FMT Consultants offers service delivery in the following areas:
Accounting and ERP Solutions, utilizing Microsoft Dynamics GP and SAP Business ByDesign
Business Intelligence
Customer Relationship Management Systems, utilizing Microsoft Dynamics CRM
Custom .NET Development and Integration Services
Collaboration and Workflow Solutions, Corporate Intranets and Line of Business Applications utilizing Microsoft SharePoint
Ecommerce
Exchange: Planning, Implementation, Migration
Virtualization: Server, Desktop, Application, VDI
System Center: Planning, Design, Implementation
Cloud Services: Windows Azure, Dynamics CRM, Windows Intune, Office 365
Server, storage and networking solutions
Since 1995, FMT Consultants has been working with clients to architect and deliver high-quality, affordable technology solutions that help them run their businesses better. As an authorized Microsoft Dynamics GP Gold Partner, Microsoft Dynamics CRM Silver Partner, SAP Partner and Dell Partner, FMT Consultants provides clients with the products and support they require for continued growth. FMT’s expertise includes analyzing, designing, implementing, developing and integrating multiple software and hardware systems, as necessary, to optimize client’s business processes and achieve their goals. In addition to doing project-based work, FMT provides support services for numerous clients in a variety of industries in order to assist them with their ongoing, day-to-day solution needs.
